name: Blastocitos
description:
Blastocitos - the action of the game takes place in the depths of space. The nameless hero defied his fate and began his journey through dozens of galaxies. On the way there will be difficulties in the form of aliens or the owners of the planet. you, in the role of a spaceship, conquer the galaxy, meeting enemies on the way, scout neighboring galaxies for other individuals.

- Stylish music by RectorFimma
- Unique gameplay
- Different types of levels
- 3 Boss
